azurerm_site_recovery_protection_contain.description: Manages a Site Recovery protection container mapping on Azure.

name.description: The name of the network mapping.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group where the vault that should be updated is located.

recovery_vault_name.description: The name of the vault that should be updated.

recovery_fabric_name.description: Name of fabric that should contains the protection container to map.

recovery_source_protection_container_nam.description: Name of the source protection container to map.

recovery_target_protection_container_id.description: Id of target protection container to map to.

recovery_replication_policy_id.description: Id of the policy to use for this mapping.

id.description: The ID of the Site Recovery Protection Container Mapping.

create.description: Used when creating the Site Recovery Protection Container Mapping.

update.description: Used when updating the Site Recovery Protection Container Mapping.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Site Recovery Protection Container Mapping.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Site Recovery Protection Container Mapping.
